title: This winter jacket has a built-in heater -- and is under $150
text:
Our editorial team is dedicated to finding and telling you more about the products and deals we love. If you love them too and decide to purchase through the links below, we may receive a commission.

If you're the kind of person that is always cold during the winter months, then you know that the struggle of finding a winter coat that goes above and beyond is real. While some coats are water-resistant and others are more stylish, there are few that have built-in heaters. Yep, you read that right.

Meet Ororo, the brand that has created perhaps the Holy Grail of outerwear.

Shop: ORORO Women's Slim Fit Heated Jacket with Battery Pack and Detachable Hood, $139.99 (orig. $199.99)

View photos

Ororo's coats have three carbon fiber heating elements that lay across your left chest, right chest and mid-back, three different heating levels, are water and wind-resistant and will stay nice and toasty for up to 10 hours.

While you're probably assuming that these jackets are bound to be bulky, they are surprisingly fitted and slim! According to the brand's Amazon page, their "goal is to make sure when you put on our heated apparel, that you are warm, comfortable and enjoying yourself."

Ororo offers these next level coats for both men and women, as well as heated vests, hoodies and gloves, with everything retailing for under $200. Shop the brand's *hottest* items below!
